citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), Office of Oceanic and Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)
citeinfo.title: Analytical Jet-turning a Corner Model of the Aleutian North Slope Current and Bering Sea Current.

descript.abstract: This is an analytic model of geostrophic currents and topographically forced to turn a corner confined by a lateral sidewall. A model to investigate spatial and temporal scales of kinematics for NPMR "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange".
descript.purpose: A model to investigate spatial and temporal scales of kinematics for NPMR "Influence of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange".
